overview: "A beach in Normandy, children running. Suddenly a female voice appears. A woman begins to take stock of her life, evokes a sexual assault experienced in her childhood. On the beach her children intermittently short-circuit her thoughts In the image, a sharpness never before acquired, something that seeks... A coming and going is created between the softness of this seaside scene and the interiority of this woman stripped bare at the same time. , taken as witness, the spectator attends the reconstruction of this bruised identity."
title: 2 La vie par volutes…
